Oscar Pistorius, track star turned convicted murderer, set to leave jailOscar Pistorius' life story from before and after Valentine's Day 2013 reads like the script to two markedly different films – the first an inspirational sporting biopic and the second a grim tale of murder. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 08:07:37 GMT NHNCXN5FTFNRTOPFVNECRYD6DY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/oscar-pistorius-track-star-turned-convicted-murderer-set-leave-jail-2024-01-04/Aadi Nair世界非洲
Artillery shells from restive Myanmar region hit southwest China town - Global TimesFive people in a Chinese town near Myanmar were wounded on Wednesday by stray artillery shells from across the border, according to China's state-controlled Global Times, as fighting between Myanmar's junta and rebels persisted despite talks. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 07:16:47 GMT 4TXL5LA6QZOAPOTZHUHXLQZ2WQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/artillery-shells-restive-myanmar-region-hit-southwest-china-town-global-times-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Exclusive: Russian hackers were inside Ukraine telecoms giant for months - cyber spy chiefRussian hackers were inside Ukrainian telecoms giant Kyivstar's system from at least May last year in a cyberattack that should serve as a "big warning" to the West, Ukraine's cyber spy chief told Reuters. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 06:33:53 GMT FOT7YNQ735NC5JFEYBKG6F4W3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-hackers-were-inside-ukraine-telecoms-giant-months-cyber-spy-chief-2024-01-04/Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Myanmar junta to free 9,652 prisoners on humanitarian grounds - state mediaMyanmar's military government will release 9,652 prisoners, including 114 foreigners, under an amnesty to mark the country's independence day, state media reported on Thursday. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 05:35:06 GMT VNCND2J5YBJELCP6ZDP3VPCCUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-junta-free-9652-prisoners-人道主义-grounds-state-media-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
In threatening shift, North Korea moves to redefine relations with SouthNorth Korea is shaking up the way it handles relations with South Korea, enacting changes to policy and government organisations that would effectively treat the South as a separate, enemy state. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 05:06:04 GMT YGY7662PONITBIUQSR44LFHLWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/throne-shift-north-korea-moves-redefine-relations-with-south-2024-01-04/Hyonhee Shin, Josh Smith世界亚太地区
South Korea opposition leader leaves ICU after knife attack - surgeonSouth Korea's opposition Democratic Party leader Lee Jae-myung was out of intensive care and was recovering from surgery to repair a major vein that was sliced in a knife attack two days ago, a surgeon who operated on him said on Thursday. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:47:24 GMT OZNQ3PL3XBJZ5MFHVYPXFNOZ5E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-opposition-leader-leaves-icu-after-knife-attack-surgeon-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
As Japan's Wajima city digs out from quake, hopes fade for tourism recoveryChef Makoto Wakabayashi was among those in Wajima hoping for a banner year as visitors returned after years of pandemic gloom. That changed on New Year's Day, with the scenic, seaside town facing a long road to recovery after a 7.6 magnitude earthquake. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:32:41 GMT 44KN4H3L7NJVZANNAHNWBQ7BL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japans-wajima-city-digs-out-quake-hopes-fade-tourism-recovery-2024-01-04/Kiyoshi Takenaka世界亚太地区
Japan's cabinet to approve reserved funds for earthquake aid next week -PMJapan's cabinet will approve next week the use of its reserved funds to cover damages from this week's massive earthquake in its west, Prime Minister Fumio Kishida said on Thursday. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:28:17 GMT HMRIYUUCPBJN3FF3SKK6YWDKOM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japans-cabinet-approve-reserved-funds-earthquake-aid-next-week-pm-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan spots more Chinese balloons, says one flew over islandTaiwan's defence ministry said it had detected three more Chinese balloons flying across the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday, and one of those flew over the island, the second day in a row it has reported such activity. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:21:03 GMT GQ4KE3E56JKGZLDYIZS6PTFYLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-spots-more-chinese-balloons-says-one-flew-over-island-2024-01-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Mask mandates return at some US hospitals as COVID, flu jumpHospitals in at least four U.S. states have reinstated mask mandates amid a rise in cases of COVID, seasonal flu and other respiratory illness. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 03:07:22 GMT FDDKRWS6LFM2TL7QB3DCH5NJXI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/mask-mandates-return-some-us-hospitals-covid-flu-jump-2024-01-04/Brad Brooks世界美国
South Korea, US conduct week-long firing drills near North Korea borderSouth Korean and U.S. troops have conducted joint combat firing drills near the border with North Korea involving heavy weapons, as Pyongyang lambasted the allies for dangerous moves pushing the region to the brink of "an inferno of nuclear war." Thu, 04 Jan 2024 02:49:41 GMT GWZE7JOVZRJ7NL23GNF5MBGCCU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-us-conduct-week-long-firing-drills-near-north-korea-border-2024-01-04/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
